subject: Horse Racing
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: New York racing officials are optimistic as Saratoga's season opens, with hopes of pitting three Triple Crown winners in the Travers, despite the economic woes plaguing other tracks.
snippet: New York racing officials are optimistic as Saratoga's season opens, with hopes of pitting three Triple Crown winners in the Travers, despite the economic woes plaguing other tracks.
